title: Not for you, peasant!
selftext:
Trump kept telling us to take hydroxychloroquine and inject bleach into our veins to cure the coronavirus. Yet when he got infected, he took the most advanced monoclonal antibody cocktail made from fetal tissue obtained from abortions and never even once took hydroxychloroquine.   


Republicans have been vilifying fetal tissue research since at least Reagan, but of course it's perfectly fine for them when one of THEM need it to stay alive.
